entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 1:00 PM MDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Temperature: 7.3°C
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1800 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
